abstract: Taking its cue from Pfizer‘s $68 billion deal for Wyeth, Sanofi-Aventis, the French pharmaceuticals company, is reportedly getting ready to do some dealmaking of its own.
lead_paragraph: Taking its cue from Pfizer‘s $68 billion deal for Wyeth, Sanofi-Aventis, the French pharmaceuticals company, is reportedly getting ready to do some dealmaking of its own.

headline.main: Sanofi Gearing Up for Acquisitions, Reports Say
